rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports findings using neutral language ('latest cases were at').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual events (latest cases) but contains no explicit calming cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports past events/facts, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports locations of cases and types of flocks, not primarily prices or numerical metrics.
The segment reports past events, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or attributed statement provides a clear, dominant frame.
Factual report of locations/types of cases without explicit framing cues.
